comments:
While building a set of Java projects that make use of an external batch file 
which creates a smart card applet, I get the following failures under 
I20030723. The problem was not present using 3.0 M2. This problem will force 
me to revert to the M2 version.

!SESSION Jul 23, 2003 11:50:35.611 --------------------------------------------
-

java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.

Command-line arguments: -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -data
